o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a resource item with a title used to indicate the resource item within the database.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a resource item with a title used to indicate the resource item within the database.

o:resource_template_property.label: is identified by

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a contrat with an exact title supplied by the notary who enacted the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a contrat with an exact title supplied by the notary who enacted the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: has title

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract instance with the type of contract chosen from a controlled vocabulary list.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract instance with the type of contract chosen from a controlled vocabulary list.

o:resource_template_property.label: has type

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a resource item with an actor responsible for creating the item.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a resource item with an actor responsible for creating the item.

o:resource_template_property.label: was brought into existence by

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property assocaties a contract with the date of its enactment. A contract might have addenda composed on later dates and in this case the property associates these dates as well.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property assocaties a contract with the date of its enactment. A contract might have addenda composed on later dates and in this case the property associates these dates as well.

o:resource_template_property.label: dateCreated

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a resource item with a brief description of the resource item created for the database.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a resource item with a brief description of the resource item created for the database.

o:resource_template_property.label: has symbolic content

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a resource item with another resource item of which it forms a part.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a resource item with another resource item of which it forms a part.

o:resource_template_property.label: forms part of

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person who is the named testator.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person who is the named testator.

o:resource_template_property.label: transferred title from

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person who is the named executor.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person who is the named executor.

o:resource_template_property.label: transferred title to

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person or organization who is named as a beneficiary.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person or organization who is named as a beneficiary.

o:resource_template_property.label: recipient

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person who is named as an heir.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a testament instance with a person who is named as an heir.

o:resource_template_property.label: custody received by

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: The property associates the testament instance with a person named as a guardian or fiduciary for the hier or heirs of the testator.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: The property associates the testament instance with a person named as a guardian or fiduciary for the hier or heirs of the testator.

o:resource_template_property.label: has current or former curator

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects the contract with a person named as a procurator in the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects the contract with a person named as a procurator in the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: agent

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a person named as a guarantor in the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a person named as a guarantor in the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: sponsor

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a person named in the contract and who is not connected by any other properties of the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a person named in the contract and who is not connected by any other properties of the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: had participant

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a testament instance with an item specified as a bequest (that it, for beneficiaries).

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a testament instance with an item specified as a bequest (that it, for beneficiaries).

o:resource_template_property.label: amount

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a testament instance with an item specified as an inheritance, that is, for the heir or hiers.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a testament instance with an item specified as an inheritance, that is, for the heir or hiers.

o:resource_template_property.label: transferred title of

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a contract with an item (physical object, such as a commodity or a manufactured item) named in the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a contract with an item (physical object, such as a commodity or a manufactured item) named in the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: documents

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a testament instance with a place named as the burial site for the testator.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property associates a testament instance with a place named as the burial site for the testator.

o:resource_template_property.label: deathPlace

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a geographical placed mentioned in the contract (apart from the place of enactment).

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a geographical placed mentioned in the contract (apart from the place of enactment).

o:resource_template_property.label: mentions

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with another contract referred to by the notary.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with another contract referred to by the notary.

o:resource_template_property.label: refers to

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a geographical location, buliding, or workplace where the contract was enacted.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a geographical location, buliding, or workplace where the contract was enacted.

o:resource_template_property.label: took place at

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a person named as a witness in the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a person named as a witness in the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: occurred in the presence of

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a textual description of the entity named as the rights holder of the contract.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a textual description of the entity named as the rights holder of the contract.

o:resource_template_property.label: right held by

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a unique identifier for the contract (generally an UUID-4 identifier).

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a contract with a unique identifier for the contract (generally an UUID-4 identifier).

o:resource_template_property.label: has preferred identifier

o:resource_template_property.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a resource item with an informal note related to the item which is intended for internal use only.

o:data.o:alternate_comment: This property connects a resource item with an informal note related to the item which is intended for internal use only.

o:resource_template_property.label: has note
